# 零售数据中台通关指南

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lingshou-shuju-zhong-tai-tongguan-zhinan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lingshou-shuju-zhong-tai-tongguan-zhinan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lingshou-shuju-zhong-tai-tongguan-zhinan
lingshou-shuju-zhong-tai-tongguan-zhinan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lingshou-shuju-zhong-tai-tongguan-zhinan
lingshou-shuju-zhong-tai-tongguan-zhinan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
